channel.title: Need first script help
channel.description:
Pretty nooby question, but bare with me.
I just downloaded SCAR, and I am using a tut from a website I am part of. I got to the very last part of the tut and it says I need to go to Script>Compile. I did and it comes up with this error ' Failed when compiling, Line 7: [Error] (7:1) : Semicolon (';') expected in script'
Very much appreciated if you'd take time to help.
Again, it is nooby because it's on a tut, but they don't tell me what to do if I have that error.

item.title: Need first script help
item.dc:creator: @slooshismyname slooshismyname
item.description:
@slooshismyname wrote:

Oh, alright.

Thanks alot mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Need first script help
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

program script;

const
Message1=‘Hello world’;

just add the ; at the end of the line

Read full topic

item.title: Need first script help
item.dc:creator: @slooshismyname slooshismyname
item.description:
@slooshismyname wrote:

program script;

const
Message1=‘Hello world’

procedure Hello;
begin
wait(1000)
Writeln(Message1);
end;

begin;
repeat
hello;
until(false)
end.

That’s the script, as requested.

Read full topic

item.title: Need first script help
item.dc:creator: @The_Wiseguy The Wiseguy
item.description:
@The_Wiseguy wrote:

Make sure you only have ONE “end.” It doesn’t matter how much “end;”

Read full topic

item.title: Need first script help
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

To be safe, put a semicolon( after EVERY line that doesn’t end in a bold word(begin, end, repeat, else, or, and).

Read full topic

item.description:
@existingqwer wrote:
